Articles.Content: Does anyone have the older KSP demos still archived? I am talking about like .13 and before. As they were free, would it be legal to distribute? If I remember correctly, someone had a thread like this that probably got destroyed in the forum massacre.

Check this thread: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/24858-Old-versions-of-KSP-%28some-versions-still-wanted!%29

Not 100% complete, but pretty darn close.
